name: enel-api
description: Addon para integrar no Home Assistant a api da rede de energia Enel

scripts.start: APP_PORT=40002 APP_DEBUG=false APP_PREFIX=/enel APP_LOG_LEVEL=debug APP_JWT_SECRET=37e92d6b44c931bdd9f8b6aef2f8f58d NODE_ENV=production node app/index.js
scripts.nodemon: APP_PORT=40002 APP_DEBUG=true APP_PREFIX=/enel APP_LOG_LEVEL=debug APP_JWT_SECRET=37e92d6b44c931bdd9f8b6aef2f8f58d NODE_ENV=development nodemon app/index.js

author: CLI CSF
